scripts.doc: typedoc --name Replicache --mode library --exclude node_modules --exclude src/*.test.ts --excludeNotExported --excludePrivate --excludeProtected --out docs --excludeExternals src/mod.ts
scripts.build: tsc && rm -rf out/wasm && mkdir out/wasm && cp -R src/wasm/* out/wasm
scripts.build:cjs: tsc --outDir out.cjs --module CommonJS && rm -rf out/wasm && mkdir out/wasm && cp -R src/wasm/* out/wasm
scripts.prepublishOnly: tool/validate-binaries-for-publish.js && npm run lint && npm run test && rm -rf out && npm run build && rm -rf out.cjs && npm run build:cjs
